thread.title: Woman Arrested For Drunk Driving At McDonald’s Drive-Thru
thread.title_full: Woman Arrested For Drunk Driving At McDonald’s Drive-Thru

author: CBS Boston
title: Woman Arrested For Drunk Driving At McDonald’s Drive-Thru
text:
Woman Arrested For Drunk Driving At McDonald’s Drive-Thru February 15, 2017 11:03 AM Filed Under: Drunk Driving , Hooksett NH , Hooksett Police , McDonald's Jaime Nelson. (Image Credit: Hooksett Police) 
HOOKSETT, N.H. (CBS) – A New Hampshire woman’s quest for fast food led to her arrest when police say she passed out at the McDonald’s drive-thru. 
Hooksett Police were called to McDonald’s on Hooksett Road just after 1 a.m. Wednesday for a woman who was unresponsive behind the wheel. 
While speaking to the woman, identified as Jaime Nelson, officers smelled alcohol. Nelson admitted to police she had been drinking. 
After taking a field sobriety test, Nelson was arrested. At the police station, Nelson recorded a blood alcohol level of .12. 
Police charged Nelson with driving while intoxicated. She was released on personal recognizance bail.
